headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing the Story for Marriott Vacations Worldwide
summary: Marriott Vacations Worldwide has seen its fair value estimate trimmed from about $68 to roughly $64 per share as analysts recalibrate expectations for the company’s growth trajectory. With the discount rate steady at 12.5% and revenue growth assumptions nudged down from roughly 23.2% to about 22.2%, the latest reset reflects a more cautious but still constructive view amid operational and leadership transitions. Read on to see how this evolving narrative could influence future valuations and...
